body:
To protect the integrity of your account, we support and recommend using 2-step verification. Once enabled, a 6-digit verification code will be sent to your phone each time your credentials are used to log into AdRoll. Requiring both your password and your phone to gain access means that your data stays safe, and also alerts you to any unauthorized attempts to gain access to your account! To get started:
1. Log into your AdRoll account.

2. Click into settings in the top right corner of the Dashboard.

3. Navigate to Personal Information.

4. Click on the button to “Enable 2-Step Verification.”

5. Register your phone number

6. You will then receive a verification code via text. Enter this code to complete 2-step set up.
name: Protecting Your Account With 2-Step Verification
title: Protecting Your Account With 2-Step Verification
